login-page.login-error: Sorry, you've provided wrong credentials or haven't been registered
login-page.e-mail-helper-text: Type in e-mail address provided to Mali Wspaniali's foundation
login-page.login-notfound: We cannot find your account in the system

login-wrapper.subheading: Join the community of conscious parents

registration-page.create-password-text: Create a password to Mali Wspaniali platform that will serve you for future logins.
registration-page.enter-code-text: Please enter the code provided by Mali Wspaniali foundation. Thanks to this code, your data will be secure.
registration-page.no-code-desc: This kind of situations can happen, nothing's lost. Please let Mali Wspaniali foundation know about your problem so our employees can generate new code for you. Send an email to biuro@mali-wspaniali.pl
registration-page.invalid-code: Code is invalid, please try again.

agreements.clausule-header: Klauzula informacyjna dla rodziców/ opiekunów prawnych dzieci biorących udział w programie MaliWspaniali
agreements.clausule: przekazywana w wykonaniu obowiązków przewidzianych w Rozporządzeniu Parlamentu Europejskiego i Rady(UE) 2016/679 z dnia 27 kwietnia 2016 r. w sprawie ochrony osób fizycznych w związku z przetwarzaniem danych osobowych i w sprawie swobodnego przepływutakich danych oraz uchylenia dyrektywy 95/46/WE (dalej jako RODO).
agreements.show-more-content-modal: Zobacz pełną treść w nowym oknie
agreements.sub-title-description: Zgoda na wykorzystanie wizerunku dziecka oraz na otrzymywanie informacji marketingowych nie są obowiązkowai nie skutkują one brakiem możliwości brania udziału w zajęciach.
agreements.statement: *Oświadczam, że zapoznałam/em się z treścią oraz akceptuję postanowienia

forgot-password-page.its-ok: Don't worry. Type in your email address.
forgot-password-page.receive-link: You will receive a link to create a new password.
forgot-password-page.insert-email: Type in e-mail address provided to the foundation
forgot-password-page.contact: Please contact the foundation to resolve it
forgot-password-page.email-helper-text: Type in e-mail address provided to the foundation
forgot-password-page.email-sent: We have sent you an email.
forgot-password-page.when-received: Once you receive it, click a link to create a new password.

keycode-generation.title: KeyCode generate
keycode-generation.description: Wybierz dla kogo chcesz wygenrować kody do rejestracji i wpisz ich liczbę. Po naciśnięciu “GENERUJ” kody zostaną wyeksportowane do pliku .xls. Klucze będą aktywne przez 7 dni. Po tym czasie należy wygenerować nowe klucze.

add-kindergarten-modal.title: Add kindergarten
add-kindergarten-modal.description: Fill in the form to add kindergarten.

edit-kindergarten-modal.title: Edit kindergarten
edit-kindergarten-modal.description: Fill in the form to edit kindergarten.

child-profile.no-child: Sorry, there is no child with this id
child-profile.description: Check how your child managed fitness tests. Find out how tests prepared by specialists from the Mali Wspaniali foundation look like.
child-profile.participation-label: Permission to participate in the Mali Wspaniali program
child-profile.participation-description: This agreement is required as its allows your child to participate in classes organized by Mali Wapaniali - unchecking is impossible
child-profile.marketing-label: Permission to receive marketing information on provided e-mail address
child-profile.marketing-description: Optional agreement that allows us to send you emails with current informations about the Mali Wspaniali program.
child-profile.image-description: Optional agreement that allows us to use materials created during our classes (e.g. for program promotion)
child-profile.age-group: On the day of test, the child was assigned to the age group

result-description.medium: You are doing well but it can always be better

child-profile.no-result-block-text: did not take place or the child was unable to participate in the test that day.
child-profile.final-test-title: Results of particular tests with comparison of results from the initial test
child-profile.comparison-label: By comparing both tests, your child's fitness level
child-profile.comparison-right-title: See what form your child is in. The chart shows how the child's results have changed over two tests
child-profile.no-results-text: The results have not yet been entered because the initial test has not yet taken place, or the results are under development.
child-profile.no-results-text-last: The results have not yet been added for one of three reasons:
child-profile.no-results-list-1: The initial test has not yet taken place or the results are under development.
child-profile.no-results-list-2: Your child was absent on the day of the initial test or was unable to take part in the tes due to random reasons.
child-profile.no-results-list-3: Your child joined the Mali Wspaniali program after the first test. The next fitness test will take place in the spring.
child-profile.no-results-bottom: To find out what the fitness test looks like, visit the
child-profile.agreements-title: Below you can check and edit the signed agreements.

parent-profile.no-parent: There is no parent with the given id

newsletter.subHeader: Fill all fields to send message
newsletter.general-recipient-helper-text: Recipient not selected. This step is necessary to specify recipient.
newsletter.specific-recipient-helper-text: Recipient not specified. Fill this field to send message to proper recipient.
newsletter.recipient-single-parent-label: To sent message to single parent, select him from the list
newsletter.recipient-single-parent-label-filled: Message will be sent to these children parents:
newsletter.recipient-single-kindergarten-label-fill: Message will be sent to these kindergartens:
newsletter.recipient-select-kindergarten-label-fill: Message will be sent to parents from these kindergartens:
newsletter.recipient-helper-text: This field can't be empty. Specify recipients. If you wish to send message to all recipients change previous selection.
newsletter.type-helper-text: Type of message not selected. Select type from dropdown.
newsletter.topic-helper-text: Type message topic so You can send it
newsletter.sending-error: An error ocurred during sending the message.

help-modal.type-text: Select the type which is most apropriate to topic of your message. Newsletter will be saved to that category, so you can find it easier in newsletter archives.
help-modal.attachment-text: To properly add attachment, it has to be in .pdf.
